content:
Yes, there are a few great places to go zip lining in Queenstown. Here are some of the most popular options:

1. Ziptrek Ecotours - This company offers a variety of zip line tours that take you through the forest canopy and offer incredible views of Queenstown and Lake Wakatipu. They have a range of tours available, including a twilight tour that takes place during sunset.

2. Skyline Queenstown - This attraction offers a gondola ride to the top of the Skyline complex, where you'll find a range of activities including zip lining. The zip line ride takes you on a thrilling journey through the forest and offers stunning views of Queenstown and the surrounding area.

3. Shotover Canyon Swing and Canyon Fox - Although not strictly a zip line activity, the Canyon Fox and Canyon Swing offered by Shotover Canyon are adrenaline-pumping and involve flying through the air. These unique activities are perfect for thrill-seekers looking for something a little different.

Overall, all three of these options are great choices for zip lining in Queenstown, but it really depends on your personal preferences and the type of experience you're looking for.
